Negative_Review: The fridge in the room was not working We stayed several nights and it was not fixed during our stay However we were given complimentary cold water whenever we asked for it so it wasn t a real problem No tea and coffe making facility in the room
Positive_Review: Staff were very friendly and helpful just a stroll to shops cafes and railway station Great location

Negative_Review: Improvement can be in list of tv channels and giving description of meals meat on good breakfast
Positive_Review: Great value good position superb wifi and nice personal

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Perfect location only five minutes to main shopping street You can take nice walk along that street directly to city center and museum square Good breakfast great coffee Small parking

Negative_Review: It has g
Positive_Review: A nice hotel that is situated slightly off the grid Close to the main shoppingstreet thats true but at the end of it that is quite far from the very city center It is at least 3o min walk to the main attractions but subway and buses are close The interior is slightly worn down but my room was comfy and surprisingly big Very efficient AC which was nice when it was around 30 celcius outdoors I had booked parking in advance so I got room but there were others who had problems with that It had a good price value combo for what I paid but it is rather overacclaimed in the text about it on booking com It is a standard 3 star hotel off the grid with friendly staff and a boring breakfast room with nice buffet

Negative_Review: The name of the hotel is not easy to remember taxi drivers has some difficulty remembering the name
Positive_Review: Location excellent staff curtieous and helpful good breakfast close to shopping good restaurants nearby especially the Greek one on the street Comfortable bed nice bathroom Steven from Sydney Australia and

Negative_Review: Check in was very cold without smile There no enough parking space in the garage so I had to drive in public garage
Positive_Review: The room is comfort and pretty clean Breakfast is good Hotel is very close to shopping street

Negative_Review: There was no rubbish bin in the room the fridge was not working properly part of the curtain was off the rail there was no shelves small large for towels or soap shampoo in the shower room the carpet in the corridors was dirty and finally the small garden was largely overall not too badneglected with old rotten and broken sun beds and mattresses
Positive_Review: Location service and staff

Negative_Review: The room felt dirty bed sunk in the middle and the walls had lots of marks on them curtains very dated Could do with a good lick of paint on the walls Only one pillow none existent of fridge in 1st room we complained and and was given another room WOULD NOT STAY IN THIS HOTEL AGAIN OR RECOMMEND IT
Positive_Review: Size of the room Location

Negative_Review: It s noticeable that rooms have seen better days we lived in a standard room but have also seen superior room which wasn t much better Furniture needs to be renewed it has noticeable scratches Bathtub didn t have a drain stopper so we could only use it as a shower We were told of a lower price when we decided to stay for 3 more days during last day checkout we were charged much more and it took around 20 minutes for me to handle this situation but we still were charged more than we were told earlier maybe because of misunderstanding or something
Positive_Review: Breakfast is great and has smoked salmon definitely recommend D Rooms were very clean Cleaning staff was quite friendly and did their job perfectly Very good location less than 5 minutes of walking to subway which is situated at Mariahilferstrasse a street with a lot of shops and restaurants Other places of interest are situated within walking distance if you re ok with walking for around 30 minutes but that was great for us Internet connection although not very quick but served its purpose for us so we were happy with it Friendly and helpful staff they were happy to explain how to get somewhere and recommended some nice places to go

Negative_Review: The hotel is surely not 4 Very dirty see pictures cigarettes on the balcony dirty windows walls cleaning staff in the middle of the corridor so that one cannot pass through The balconies are tiny meant only for security exit Very hot rooms as the a c is not working properly Breakfast is in the cellar is a disaster as already at 9 00 there was no coffee left Personal speaks bearly German is very indifferent The worst stay in Vienna
Positive_Review: The location is central

Negative_Review: Some how reminded me of a bunker of sorts And you had better have a lot of nerve if you re going to use the underground parking My travelling companion was not willing to be in the vehicle when it was time to come out She still to this day can t imagine how I managed it without either hitting one of the walls and there was copious evidence of that having happened or pooping my pants So fine cheap parking elsewhere and get there by subway and on foot
Positive_Review: Half decent breakfast which is about all one can expect I suppose Good coffee from a dedicated machine which I find is the most important item of all

Negative_Review: Probably because of the location of my room the wireless signal was weak
Positive_Review: The hotel was very pleasant quiet very clean and service was excellent The lobby area was very nice and there was a small garden next to it Its location close to Mariahilfe Strasse and the Ubahn was very convenient

Negative_Review: Breakfast placement
Positive_Review: Place is at the center clean good neighborhood Single room bed is uncomfortable There is no kettle in the room you have to pay 2 for tea or coffee breakfast is good not a bad choice but overpriced

Negative_Review: Breakfast room is UNDERGROUND with NO WiNDOWS Choose of food was not so big and NO LEMON SLICES Chairs were all dirty I had to clean it myself before sitting
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Talk about all that glistens reception area been modernised and looks okay but the rest of the place is a disgrace The hallway carpets are filthy the walls marked inside and outside the rooms Cheap furnishings and very tacky indeed The garden looks like it has been deserted and is really awful with weeds and old furniture abandoned Very disappointing indeed The china in the breakfast room was 90 chipped I have never seen this in a hotel before The little bucket on the table for waste was badly broken with a sharp and dangerous edge The coffee machine was on a couple of bits of wood and the worktop it stood on had lost its edge so looks awful
Positive_Review: Good location close to shopping area Parking helpful Breakfast food quite acceptable

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Perfect location quiet but near underground U bahn and near main shop street Good staff beautiful woman helps me with a car service I ll stay here one more time

Negative_Review: Air condition was central and it was not that strongly working
Positive_Review: Breakfast is magnificient above the expectations Hotel stuff is very kind and very helpful We asked for iron it came in 4 minutes to our room Hotel is close to West train station and walking distance to the Subway

Negative_Review: The air in the room wasn t fresh and the breakfast was quite low budget type coffey was terrible
Positive_Review: Location is very good if you are interested in shopping In addition it is located at a quiet neigbourhood and keeping window open for the night wasn t a problem

Negative_Review: Carpet was badly marked in corridor leading to our room A tea coffee making machine would have been good
Positive_Review: Helpful Staff Good location 5 minute walk from one of the main shopping areas and tube station Just a few stops from the old town where there are plenty of restaurants bars Very comfortable bed Good shower Excellent breakfast

Negative_Review: Matress was not comfortable Cleaning stuff walked into my room 3 times without knocking because they thought the room was supposed to be cleaned and didn t think I had checked in Pretty uncomfortable Really wanted to use bathtub but was told there is no stopper for the water because the handy guy took it with him was very disappointed by that In general hotel needs refurbishment as many other point out and it is more a 3 star rather than 4 star definitely
Positive_Review: Reception staff were very friendly Location was really good

Negative_Review: Bathroom sink tap broken twice in 3 days smell of bathroom was no good and the Wi Fi signal was poor inside the room
Positive_Review: Good breakfast staf is kind and the room had good space

Negative_Review: They do not have coffee maker in room Pillows are lumpy and thin like a newspaper Ity is a bit of a twisty drive to get there either by taxi or in your own car Secure parking but the reservation need because are only 5 6 parking places
Positive_Review: Very close to subway station and 5 min away to the main central part of the city and Mariahilfe shopping street The staff is welcoming and nice Usual European breakfast included lasts from 7 am to 10 am I recommend to go have it before 9 30 as some products tend to run out There are many things to choose from but for example veggies and fruits were wilted Try the smoked salmon first class There are some bookshelves and a bar in the hotel lobby but we didn t use it Billa supermarket is not far from the hotel Good wifi connection Try for room 410 It is large and loads of windows

Negative_Review: We were 2 business men paid 305 euro for one simple quite dark room Terribly expensive True that the city was full on that day stilk outrageous
Positive_Review: They had the only room left in town on that night

Negative_Review: Receptionists should be nicer smiling kind they were rather cold On Sunday when I came back from the city around 3pm the room wasn t done Although there was lovely black velvet armchair I was terribly missing side table there was enough space for it and floor lamp
Positive_Review: The room was spaceful overall clean and really quiet Appreciated safety box and nice bathroom with huge mirror

Negative_Review: Seriously for a four stars include a kettle in the room Upgrade the single bed into something decent
Positive_Review: The hotel is in a very good location off mariahilfer The breakfast was excellent and the hotel is very clean throughout Yet I made the error of booking a single room which came with a wobbly single bed I did complain about it but nothing was done to fix that I would book a double bed and avoid single beds I think it was simply a cheap bed Though the mattress was very good and comfortable The WiFi was great and the staff were very helpful There are no facilities in the hotel So very basic for a four stars

Negative_Review: Dirty windows with a lot of dust bathroom shower broken both cap and hose Corridor carpet very dirty and stained on first floor A lot of noise can be heard from one room to another We were woken up by neighbors every night I had 4 beers on my bill on check out even though I did not consume them
Positive_Review: Good location very nice staff on site secure car park at extra cost

Negative_Review: Pillows were too soft very uncomfortable Bed sheets felt overused hotel has immediate need of some replacements Walls have stains need to be repainted In general hotel needs a few tweeks and would be excellent
Positive_Review: In general everything was ok location is very good next to the biggest shoppping street Breakfast is also good

Negative_Review: It s clear that the hotel needs some refurbishments especially in the room walls that are not well treated The breakfast is standard one
Positive_Review: The staff is really friendly and work to make your stay more comfortable nice location for the price

Negative_Review: Breakfast could be a little more various But still fairly good
Positive_Review: Nice and quiet room in the inner courtyard Comfortable bed and pillows Pretty good breakfast Staff very friendly Oh and the most sexy cleaning lady we ve ever seen on second floor

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The room with a small balcony looking inside a neat yard All available silence to get some rest The hotel is close to the city center but brilliantly isolated from the noise out there

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Garage for only 14 Euro very good for travelers with a car we take back our car after 16 00 thanks a lot for that Hotel is very well positioned Very close to shopping street and undeground station

Negative_Review: I would like to have a little smile from the staff at the reception I usually go to this hotel in Wien at least 2 3 times per year since 2014 but I have never had a smile or a welcome smile from them
Positive_Review: close to the metro station parking place available not expensive Room confortable Breakfast superb

Negative_Review: Salad bar could have been much richer
Positive_Review: Staff is friendly and very open responding to requests timely and professionaly Wi Fi is confident with the great coverage

Negative_Review: Coffee machine was descaling repeatedly causing delays in the morning Knifes are blunt Some noticeable wear of the facilities
Positive_Review: Staff was very friendly and helpful Location is almost perfect as a starting point We went to SCS first for some shopping and wasted hours while we could find just about everything in the Mariahilferstrasse Close to museums and the inner ring Value for money was great would visit again Tip you can park free on weekends on spaces marked with the white line

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: location in the center close to some reaturants bistro cafe but quite nice and helpful staffs we even got free coffee and cake due to farewell of one of the staffs Price was not that expensive compare to other nearby hotels checked on booking com Great and will come back

Negative_Review: Wifi seemed a bit patchy in my room I thought the bedside light could have been stronger or maybe I should get my eyes checked
Positive_Review: Just five mins walk from the metro U bahn everything about the hotel including breakfast was fine

Negative_Review: The Romanian guest next to me at breakfast ate the entire tray of smoked salmon He also took about ten boiled eggs but only ate the whites leaving all the yolks
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: The rooms were quite tired in appearance lots of marks on the walls stains on the carpets etc
Positive_Review: Breakfast buffet was good but not really 4 star standard when you compare to other hotels

Negative_Review: The room was dirty The breakfast was plain The parking advertised as free was not available at night but I was promised a solution in the morning for a small fee not cool And the room was really DIRTY
Positive_Review: It is close to Mariahilfe strasse

Negative_Review: When I checked in the first room was not clean with dirty spots on carpets and walls Even the safe was missing in that room After complain they gave me a new room which was much better and clean
Positive_Review: Very friendly staff Very good breakfast buffet The rooms were cleaned good Location is 4 minutes walk to Mariahilfer Strasse and near U3 Underground Station

Negative_Review: The staff at reception could be a bit friendlier and helpful
Positive_Review: The bed was comfortable very close to Mariahilfe strasse a big supermarket just next to the hotel nice breakfast

Negative_Review: If laundry is needed coin laundry is 15 20 min walk and close early at 10pm
Positive_Review: Location is convenient Staff is very nice The shower head was leaky and closet door was broken Hotel staff moved us to the other room right away

Negative_Review: The air temperature in the room too warm It was impossible to modify it instead of all the attempts The breakfast room on the underground level total lack of at mosphere
Positive_Review: The situation Very close to the central actractions

Negative_Review: Shower head holder in bathroom needs replacing It isn t possible to secure this in an appropriate position Fresh coffee in pots would taste a lot better and avoid queue at coffee machine We do latter every day at work not very nice
Positive_Review: Fantastic location room extremely clean

Negative_Review: The breakfast not too much to be chosen we had to wait for the table
Positive_Review: Fantastic location Very nice staff Breakfast is poor quality of food to be discussed No place in the restaurant we had to wait until the table was available Room was big just like in the picture on the hotel s website

Negative_Review: I booked parking mentioned in the comments but on arrival they informed me you have not selected parking requirement while sending the request and gave me address of parking lot which was almost 10 15 mins away by foot and they charge Euro 10 for a night
Positive_Review: Good Location Very near to famous walking street Good Breakfast Well Decorated Room

Negative_Review: there are no disposable sleepers in rooms even if it is full of carpets Plus we did not have a water heater in room to make our tea A hotel at their rate I believe suppose to have it Ok bar is open 24h for coffee or tea but I would prefer to make a tea in my room whenever i want However for the performance of hotel i am ready to skip them all and come here to stay one more time
Positive_Review: Great Breakfast Prepare also a good sandevich for the day trips Good Location as Close to metro station to reach center with 3 stations only or walk on main shopping center for 15 20 min max Clean hotel and great staff to help you all time

Negative_Review: The worst thing was the bathroom light switch which was outside the bathroom so when one occupant uses the bathroom which is right opposite the bed the other occupant gets disturbed If the bathroom and the bed were not opposite each other it would not be so bad We had an attic room the other rooms might be different It was hard to keep the rooom door open as we entered with all our luggage The carpets especially in the corridors looked dirty The carpets in the entire hotel can do with some cleaning The wifi was not that good
Positive_Review: It is Value for Money We were lookng for something inexpensive with breakfast in a good location and this hotel met the requirements reasonably well The hotel was warm and cosy which was important as it was winter Breakfast was quite good bed was comfortable Bathroom was decent The room was clean Location is pretty good as the street Webgasse is directly connected to Mariahilferstrasse the main shopping street in Vienna and everything is easy to reach with the metro

Negative_Review: I think that it does not merit 4 star I think it should just be 3 star The bathroom was not lighted well and was dark were the shower was Aside from which there is no shower closure so the water tends to splash out We borrowed some coffee mugs We used it and when we arrived that evening the mug and spoon were not washed We washed it ourselves The telephone did not have any instructions on how to use it So calling the reception or room to room or operator was practically not possible I tried dialing 9 and 0 and all the lower bottons to no avail
Positive_Review: The location is good It is near a grocery Billa and at the end of the road is the shopping street It is also near the subways to get to the inner city or old town The breakfast is also good Room rate comes with breakfast You have a good choice is cold cuts scrambled and boiled eggs juice coffee choice of breads and oats They also have a fruit table The staff in the reception were very helpful

Negative_Review: The pillows could be better they should put 2 in each room as standard
Positive_Review: Great location very friendly and helpful staff nice little bar selling some local beers

Negative_Review: For the rooms at then end of the hallway ie 218 the wifi online covers half of the room and the signal is very weak
Positive_Review: Breakfast was very good great variety of products

Negative_Review: Pillows and bed hard However If we had made a remark directly they could provide us a topper which is good The curtains couldn t be fully closed so a lot of light came in in the morning I think this is room dependent
Positive_Review: Friendly and helpfull staff when we arrived to our room it was smelling sigarettes It is not allowed to smoke in the rooms after we complained we directly got a new room Thanks Location very good

Negative_Review: Poor breakfast noisy and very unpleasant way of using the emergency stairs for smoking it was impossible to open the window even if the room was very overheated because the smoke was flowing in from the neighbors
Positive_Review: Location is great

Negative_Review: No room service very basic bar no snacks in the room or available from reception Housekeeping were in the rooms very early before 9am along with other guests slamming doors as they went out it wasn t easy to have a relaxing morning
Positive_Review: Nice rooms close to the main shopping street

Negative_Review: The rooms are not fresh re painting is absolutely needed The mattresses are very old I felt the metal springs very well so I could not sleep until I got 3 blankets There were not slippers in the room which is ridiculous for 4 star hotel The heating in the bathrooms did not work I asked for extra pillow in the evening as a result I did not receive them at all The pillows are old as well very bad quality The carpet covering the floor in the room is dirty in a lot of spots The lamps near the bed are damaged The curtains are damaged as well do not have all the yellow buttons
Positive_Review: Good location

Negative_Review: Disappointing that there were no restaurant facilities at all for evening meals Although the overall quality of the food served for breakfast from 7am onwards was Ok including a range of cold meats and cheeses hot food was very limited to smoked sausage and scrambled boiled eggs
Positive_Review: The staff were extremely polite and helpful with a great deal of customer focus Room facilities were of a good standard with comfortable bed safe for valuables and underground parking facilities Quiet room with balcony

Negative_Review: Simple basic facilities and the walls and floor are paper thin not great if you are a light sleeper
Positive_Review: Staff were great underground secure parking comfortable bed free simple continental breakfast and close to shopping strip Museum Quarter and some interesting restaurants

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: I loved the location of the hotel The room was clean and at quiet the breakfast was good Lots of good restaurants to choose from for dinner in the vecinity of the hotel

Negative_Review: The hotel and the room were not good standard The curtains did not fit the window My contact with staff apart from Justina showed them to be very grumpy and not interested in me as a customer I had to ask three times for an iron and every day for the fridge to be fixed
Positive_Review: Justina was the only receptionist who was pleasant and helpful

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The location of the property is 2 minutes away from Mariahilfestrasse The breakfast was really good and rich The rooms are very pretty clean the bed was very cosy The girls froms the reception were very nice and helpful

Negative_Review: There was a problem with the sink in bath I warned receptionist to have it fixed I came back to hotel at 23 at night the problem was not fixed I warned again but receptionist told me it can only be fixed in the morning I would stay there only for one night anyway I would pay cash not to debit my credit card but they charged my card without asking me
Positive_Review: location is good 2 min walking distance from Mariahilferstrasse which is one of the main streets in Vienna u nderground carpark is available for a very reasonable price

Negative_Review: The bed mattress or mattress cover was a bit ridged Nothing else was great for the price location
Positive_Review: Super location quiet but not far away from shopping street and U3 underground station Very friendly reception staff Nice modern style hotel with good size room and bathroom Very clean Smoked Salmon for breakfast Breakfast buffet always refilled

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The staff were terrific and helpful The Hotel looked after our large travel cases while we cycled the Danube for a week One of the best breakfast spreads we had while in Europe

Negative_Review: 1 the street is really noisy by night and reception should tell so 2 Some rooms definitely need a fresh up and repaint All in all quite expensive for what it is
Positive_Review: Good location

Negative_Review: Bit of a walk to the old town and the bright lights A sober and douce neighbourhood
Positive_Review: A modern and well appointed hotel Decent bar and very clean and tidy bar Very safe

Negative_Review: underground parking is 14 EUR night could be mentioned in the hotel description outside there was little to no parking space
Positive_Review: spacious good breakfast close to metro station clean quiet

Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: Very friendly staff provided useful information and support helped to book and print a reservation Excellent location close to the subway station and main attractions Good breakfast

Negative_Review: The air condition was inactive in my room in a very hot day it was a complete nightmhere to sleep in these conditions my complain was not taken seriosely they promised me to send sombody after my departure
Positive_Review: The placement is good

Negative_Review: The name of the hotel is just The Hotel on the sign outside with no mention of 1060 until you got inside which was a bit confusing on arrival
Positive_Review: Great location and very helpful staff Breakfast was excellent and wifi worked well

Negative_Review: I have stay many times in this hotel and always was perfect This time room was with smell not clean and madrace was not flat making sleep uncomfortable During check in lady from reception was talking with guest in Bulgarian language explaining directions and suggesting place in city She didnt pay attantion to me even I was waiting more than 10 minutes I understand it is important to help countrymans but still I m guest as well and it was almost 22 00 h Finaly another person come and take care about my check in I am not satisfied at all with this stay
Positive_Review: Location

Negative_Review: Mattress not very comfortable not up to 4 star hotel standards Bedspread was stained and did not give a very clean impression pillow cover and sheets were fine though The inner garden has a fairly neglected appearance
Positive_Review: Very good position easy to reach from the airport with public transport friendly staff and big rooms

Negative_Review: AC was on but the room was still really warm at night Don t think it was working properly Bar in the hotel could have been better
Positive_Review: Stylish hotel on the outskirts of Vienna Metro is at the end of the street which brings you to the city center in 5 mins Area around the hotel has funky bars and different types of restaurants Safe area to walk at night Vietnamese place at the end of the street was excellent and really good value for money

Negative_Review: Make some changes about breakfast For me was a four time in the last 3 years and it s THE SAME I not eating there but my friend insisted just for once and It was enough for her We talk about 4 star More attention at the cleanliness A little bit noisy the room you cannot let the door on terace open in the morning for air because all the smoke came into it
Positive_Review: The girls at the reception the internet the position of the hotel That s why i came here for 4th time I ignore the rest but i can tell you about it

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Luxury conditions at affordable prices close to the city centre and main attractions Large newly refurbished rooms Charming hotel lobby for a chat with friends before bed time

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Hotel was not very Clean As a singleroom I did not get a proper bed but a sofabed which was not very komfortable Breakfast Hall was too Small for the Number of people residing at the hotel Overall really Bad Value for money

Negative_Review: Our towels were never changed we never got fresh bathroom towels They folded our used towels every day and put them on the bathroom shelf In our stay they never changed bed sheets I argued every day at the reception in order for them to provide us with fresh towels the reception closes every day at 22 00 pm there is no one there they return the next day at 07 00 am so if you happen to need anything at all at the reception desk forget it they leave there a night watch man that just explains that the desk will work again at 07 00 am next morning the cleaning staff arrived at our room at 16 00 pm afternoon sometimes 17 00 pm Breakfast is rediculous they have a broken down coffee machine if you happen to arrive at the breakfast room at 09 00 am there is no bread only stale buns no sausages and the scrambled eggs smell rotten very dark brown colour dishes are cracked and broken the breakfast staff has no smile and does not know the meaning of the word goodmorning It is definitly at best a 2 star hotel
Positive_Review: somewhat quiet section in the city a conveniant supermarket almost next to it

Negative_Review: Hard bed few parking places at the hotel and if availabilty then rather expensive Restaurant where breakfast takes place looks like a cantine with a lot of people and a restless ambiance Due to the self sevice your table is not secured when you come back
Positive_Review: Confortable and clean hotel Choice of breakfast food is luxurious

Negative_Review: Wifi did not work staff informed and did not care People in the courtyard smoking and talking loudly caused disruption all night each night of my stay Bed was solid as a rock Shower head was broken on arrival had to be replaced not even an apology The staff I found were quite rude
Positive_Review: Nothing

Negative_Review: the room the week before in the building facing Webgasse had a cigarette smoke smell and it was changed to another
Positive_Review: the room was great though a week before it wasn t not all the rooms are as good it was spacious clean anf had a blacony the breakfast is great

Negative_Review: Airconditioning doesn t work efficiently despite of intervention by staff serwisant He said that it is old equipment and it can t work better It s a pity
Positive_Review: very good breakfast and generaly rooms are nice hotel is close to the metro and it has got the private underground parking Airconditioning doesn t work efficiently

Negative_Review: wifi very slow
Positive_Review: It s really good hotel mostly we liked everything Room with balcony on the nice quite street ficilities good breakfast clean room we have no problem with it Hotel made for us late check out 4PM without charge

Negative_Review: Nothing to complain about everything was amazing
Positive_Review: Excellent location great staff delicious breakfast faultless wifi connection very clean and spacious room and bathroom

Negative_Review: the room was very bed smelling the walls and carpet was dirty the bed was very uncomfortable for that price it is not worth we had to pay for baby coat 10euros what normally is for free when you pay so much I would not recommend that hotel at all
Positive_Review: localisation

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Location was good Centric and a 3 minute walk from the main shopping street in Vienna Breakfast was good and it offered a wide variety of options Coffee from the machine was very nice

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Good location Staff was friendly and helpful Garage was a great advantage The room was quiet clean well furnished and spacious The hotel was up to all our requirements I would stay there again

Negative_Review: Bathroom did not have enough towel racks and there was no place except floor for toiletteries while you were in shower In addition the room should include luggage rack so that the luggage does not need to be stored on the floor
Positive_Review: Hotel was situated conveniently close to the metro The hotel staff was very friendly and helpful They were well aware of all events in the city The room was spacious peaceful and clean Breakfast buffet was average However due to the small inconveniences in the room I would give rather 3 than 4 stars

Negative_Review: Awful internet connection
Positive_Review: Don t book room number 123 unless you want to sit in the toilet for internet connection Beyond this everything was good Every thing that we asked for responded quickly

Negative_Review: Trouble with the room meant a change a mysterious incident with a loss of money and unresponsive staff unwilling to investigate
Positive_Review: Breakfast was excellent good food great selection

Negative_Review: you don t have any hanger for your hand face towel and it would be useful you don t have anything to sit on in the balcony they don t have variety of drinks at the bar
Positive_Review: great location even though the parking is very narrow it is safe and useful easy access very good cleaning services nice variety of products for breakfast good prices at the hotel bar very comfy bed

Negative_Review: The shower head was loose so showering awkward but fixed when we reported it
Positive_Review: Very pleasant helpful staff Not msny hotel receptionists would chase a client when they leave for a block and a half to give them back their hat The buffet breakfast was excellent

Negative_Review: The pillows are absolutely horrific In order to get to our room we had to walk through a garden which was fine unless it was raining then it was annoying We paid for a room with a balcony and it turned out said balcony was actually a fire escape
Positive_Review: Breakfast was amazing Hotel was excellent value for money and the location was perfect Will definitely be staying here again

Negative_Review: The bathroom is modern but very dis functional Shower floods floor slippery tiles no hooks or rails to hang towels dark and small
Positive_Review: Clean and modern hotel with reasonably priced parking Room was spacious and bright but with dis functional bathroom Good and varied breakfast Nice lobby Close to metro and shops

Negative_Review: This time we didn t had the safe in room and not all light bulbs was operative
Positive_Review: chambermaid work was very ready made Reception personal was heard our ask for room number

Negative_Review: totally satisfied
Positive_Review: Clean and modern exterior is deceptive but once you step into the foyer could not help being impressed Smart and airey the foyer set the standard for the hotel Breakfast selection was good

Negative_Review: The shower unit is badly designed as it is impossible to prevent water from the shower from practically soaking the floor Poor drinks provision at the bar
Positive_Review: A wide choice of dishes for breakfast Very courteous helpful staff Easy access to the sights of Vienna

Negative_Review: Better signage in hotel perhaps The breakfast room and reception can be hard to find
Positive_Review: Ideal location just far enough away from the busy Mariahilfestrasse Friendly competent staff good breakfast choice quiet airconditioned room Have stayed there many times always a pleasure and excellent value for money

Negative_Review: The price is slightly overpriced Pity that there is no kettle neither slippers for the superior room
Positive_Review: The breakfast is definitely good Hotel is easy to find and convenient to reach all other sights

Negative_Review: Air condition worked very poorly 1 tecnitian came to check only the next day just to say he don t know what to do and how to fix it The shower is very simple quite small and the maintainace is not Good Parts fall a part while using the shower t
Positive_Review: Nice and fair breakfast Location ok and the street is relatively quiet

Negative_Review: No English speaking channels on tv apart from news No kettle or welcoming water
Positive_Review: The location was very good around 350 meters from the Mariahilfstrasse and the underground Breakfast was nice Room was clean and spacious and stuff were helpful

Negative_Review: Would have preferred a better choice of fruits at breakfast such as berries not fruit in juice and better labelling of foods
Positive_Review: Nice clean room Quiet

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The staff were very friendly cooperative and helpful Location was superb Ambience was good and rooms were spacious and cozy Overall the stay was a sweet memory

Negative_Review: Location isn t all that great but also not too bad Very much depends on what you re planning to do in Vienna of course The room was okay and clean but nothing to write home about
Positive_Review: Staff at reception was very friendly Missed the breakfast so cannot comment on that

Negative_Review: The shower room had a bad kind of chemical smell inside Also breakfast is quite poor
Positive_Review: Close to subway interesting stylish room very good shower Very stable and nice internet wifi

Negative_Review: As with many European hotels the shower game is weak The towels though clean were ratty and frayed and the shower head needed some serious work The holder and the shower head itself were both broken Not ideal
Positive_Review: This is a great location for an overnight or weekend stay because of its central location to all areas of the city Though not spectacular the room is comfortable enough for a few days The breakfast on the other hand is top notch

Negative_Review: Not clean Unpleasant device One towel in the room No even toilet paper in the washroom Very expensive Unfriendly staff
Positive_Review: It is a mediocre building and it is actually not a fair statement to call it a hotel

Negative_Review: Unfortunately the bad wasn t not very comfortable and the rooms were not soundproof at wall we were able to listen to our neighbors discussions
Positive_Review: The breakfast was really good and the minibar consumption was on them

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Very good service and comfortable and very clean rooms they even changed the towels every day Really rich and fresh breakfast Very close to the metro station though the city center was rather close also on foot and of course nearby Mariahilfestrasse which is great for shopping I would definately suggest it

Negative_Review: Didn t get off to the best of starts arrived to check in about 9 30 9 45pm asked if there was somewhere local we could get a meal not too difficult a question for a receptionist to answer I would have thought reply was bit late now no where would be open you could try Greek restaurant up the road they may be open still we discovered next day that there were plenty of places nearby that we could have eaten at Think perhaps that being used to staying in chain type hotels Accor novotel etc etc that the level of staff training is much better at those ok now for breakfast continental well it was er continental cold meat cheese frankfurters boiled eggs well I could knock something together to keep me going but my wife was not impressed free Wi Fi was rubbish
Positive_Review: Room was very spacious bright and airy was let down by silly things really beds very narrow and not very comfortable bed lights loose and shades damaged curtains that didn t quite fit the window so let the light in balcony overlooking garden would have been nice to sit out there in the sun if there had been any chairs no coffee tea making facilities ensuite was brilliant clean modern with a great wet room type shower everywhere was really clean though the White walls everywhere were a little tired and needed refreshing some of the hotel d cor was a little strange weird pictures in the breakfast room large pink budda type figure in reception but all in all good hotel good location easy access to metro about 300mtrs on main street just 4 stops to city centre plenty of shops cafes restaurants etc But go and enjoy the Beautiful City of Vienna

Negative_Review: I found some minor maintenance problems plumbing lighting The breakfast was not very exciting but it is OK for the category of the hotel To begin with the tables in the breakfast space could be rearranged as they appear today that make you think of a cafeteria rather than a fancy hotel
Positive_Review: The hotel is in a very quiet spot of the city yet it is very close to a metro station and to the Ring The furnishing is nice and everything looks new and carefully planned The personnel at the concierge was nice and helpful

Negative_Review: Internet was very very slow I dont know if it was only during my stay because sometimes network issues happen however I couldnt even dowload 5mb file in email
Positive_Review: Everything was perfect at the hotel also location I recommend everyone who travels for both leisure and business

Negative_Review: Webgasse is not a well known street for some reason
Positive_Review: The staff were extremely nice and friendly The room was quiet and nice The bed was slightly small twin bed but everything else was ok The location is somewhat hard to find but it is two blocks from the train station Once one learns one s way around it was very nice

Negative_Review: The beds were terrible When you book a hotel you expect to be able to sleep We found the beds were impossibly uncomfortable and regardless of how good anything else may have been I would not stay here again Also the balcony was a fire escape
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: I was satisfied with everything
Positive_Review: The location of this lovely hotel is perfect very close to the centre but in a quiet street Staff was very professional and helpful Room was comfortable and clean Thank you

Negative_Review: The wifi broke down on our first day of arrival which was extremely inconvenient as we struggled to find a store that sold SIM card on a Sunday We asked the receptionist and she said it was because the hotel was fully booked It was not an acceptable excuse and we had to use the paper map to plan tomorrow s trip without a way to communicate with our family and friends Nevertheless it was already fixed on the next day The bed on the other hand was not the cleanest one I found dusts on my blanket so it was not very confortable For the location although there were quite a number of shops on the street right before you make a turn towards the hotel it was 10 minutes away from the Wien Westhbf
Positive_Review: Breakfast was nice in general Although it was really full on the first day and we struggled to find a seat at first The room size was great Plenty of space in the bathroom and a separate washroom

Negative_Review: Shower head wonky No tea coffee facilities in room Breakfast room in basement located in an uninspiring side street
Positive_Review: Near Zeiglestrasse U Bahn and shops on Mariahilfe strasse Vienna s Oxford Street Happy staff Nice wine only 2 euros per glass at the bar Balcony doubles as fire escape over looks courtyard Free safe in room

Negative_Review: room was too warm even with radiators turned off absence of brochure in room regarding hotel facilities
Positive_Review: excellent and friendly receptionists good selection at breakfast buffet excellent lounge

Negative_Review: Nothing great place to stay and I will be coming back in a couple months to stay there again
Positive_Review: I left some things in the safe and they were most helpful in helping me get them back They were outstanding

Negative_Review: Poor wi fi connection in the room
Positive_Review: Very peaceful part od the city yet close to the main shopping street in Vienna Good breakfast Kind and untiring stuff

Negative_Review: Couldn t work out the heating and was a bit cold and the bed was too firm for out liking
Positive_Review: Location was amazing nice bathroom and decent sized room and bed Overall a great stay

Negative_Review: As coming from UK our group commented that it would nave been much appreciated if there was facilities in guest rooms for hot drinks I e a kettle in the room
Positive_Review: Cleanliness friendly and helpful staff and easy accessible to the city centre

Negative_Review: This is NOT a 4 stars hotel But a 2 stars very similar to an hostel The photos do not correspond to the reality the hotel needs an urgent reconstraction Everythis is old and dirty The staff is inpolite even don t say Hello trying do avoid any costomer s questions and requiests The brekfast is poor and sad
Positive_Review: The location is not excellent situated in a small and dark Street but not far from the metro

Negative_Review: balcony is almost shared with another room there is some small metal obstacle wish can be easily jumped over so you have to be careful to lock your balcony doors
Positive_Review: Breakfast was ok bathroom with heating floors was great especially in winter parking in the garage was conveninent great location nice staff

Negative_Review: Parking place is not a cheapest one
Positive_Review: The location of this hotel is pretty good there are a lot of restaurants cafes souvenir gift shops and entertainment facilities nearby Also there is a subway station in 5 minute walk The room was nice and very quite The breakfast was amazing

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Beautiful modern hotel perfect breakfast Roooms clean huge bathroom quiet place Own parkplaces under hotel very pleasant secure place cute personal

Negative_Review: The breakfast was pretty basic I would like to recommend some pancakes and omelet in addition to their compilation
Positive_Review: The staff were nice and helpful during our entire stay The rooms were cleaned everyday

Negative_Review: We couldn t find the switches for the lamps above the bed so we called the reception and were tersely told to either remove the card and cut off the electricity or to unscrew them ourselves When we complained a maintenance person was sent up and unscrewed the light bulbs It all felt rather unprofessional and in the morning we found the switches which were low down on the wall in an odd spot behind the pillows I guess the hotel also had no idea where their own light switches were Also there was no kettle to boil water I was somewhat sick and it would ve been great to have had a way to make tea Otherwise the hotel was fine
Positive_Review: The location was fantastic perfect for going out to cafes bars and shops The room was large and roomy

Negative_Review: Very dirty walls and flooring in corridors and in our room No room service breakfast Tepid water for tea in breakfast room
Positive_Review: Reasonably convenient location and friendly staff

Negative_Review: No coffee Tea in the room rooms were recently renovated but the carpet was dirty and smelled bad needs to be changed
Positive_Review: Great location Easy accsess to all over the town Good breakfast nice staff clean room

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Right by shopping high street couple of stops away from the centre and walking distance to the Palace Staff is amazing and very helpful Rooms are really nice

Negative_Review: the room was dirty extremely small the carpet was stained in several places the walls in the room were dirty and broken the bed linen were overused the towels were fringed
Positive_Review: location close to Maria Hilferstrasse

Negative_Review: Hotel corridor walls were worn Walls are very thin
Positive_Review: The girl that checked us in was super helpful we were given early checkin at no extra cost Our room was warm and comfortable Breakfast was good Hotel was conveniently located close to underground station only 4 stops from city centre

Negative_Review: Internet works but it s quite slow It s close to the train station but not at the heart of the city We usually took the metro to go to the touristic spots It could have more TV channels in English
Positive_Review: Good bedroom and bathroom with bathtub Few blocks from shopping streets and metro station Nice modern decoration Breakfast included

Negative_Review: I didn t like the girl from the desk in the night that I arrived She was mean wasn t polite at all This kind of attitude can ruin your stay
Positive_Review: I liked the girls from the front desk but on my second day They were kind and helpfull I liked the breakfast the location and the design of the hotel

Negative_Review: Unfriendly staff uncleaned room wall full of dark lines no early breakfast possible no way for a compromise to cancel the reservation or to find a later date some days before because of an strong illness
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Scruffy and poorly maintained hotel throughout I am sure that the hotel was a good quality when first established but since then little has been spent on maintenance marks on walls common areas rooms chips on furniture marks and stains on sofas buttons missing in lift there s a long list Generally shabby
Positive_Review: Good location close to Westbahnhof Station and Mariahilferstrasse

Negative_Review: Shortage of restaurants nearby Plenty of caf s though
Positive_Review: The location was excellent for travelling by tram bus or underground Not far from main road Ideal shopping location Pleasant walk to tourist area

Negative_Review: The ladies at the reception could be friendlier more welcoming After all they are the face of the hotel to the guests The cleaning in the rooms could be more thorough
Positive_Review: Excellent location Literally just 1 minute walk from the busy shopping street of Mariahilfer and Zeiglergasse metro station which would take you right to the heart of the city in four stops The lobby is stylish the rooms are clean comfortable chic Breakfast is good and tasty Overall great value for money

Negative_Review: Our booking had breakfast but in restaurant there is no place to sit and we had to wait When we found the table the waiters just picked the things without realy cleaning Also the hotel had dirty walls broken buttons in elevator The room service does not exist at all and they changed only the towels not sheets The room was cold nobody told us that we must opened alone heating but also with heathing we feel cold The girl receptionist all the time staring at computer and we felt like invisible beacuse she never said even hallo when we go inside or left hotel I realy do not recommend this hotel and I wonder for scores in booking
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: There were small amentities missing such as one use sleepers and bed cover was consisted of two differnt pieces there were no normal glasses except plastic ones there was no boiler to prepare a hot beverage
Positive_Review: Location close to public transport

Negative_Review: It s really dirty in rooms We had to change room but the other was not much better The impression is that cleaning ladies are not very happy and don t give any effort to clean anything Tips didn t make them any happier Besides walls and all the fabrics are dirty too bed cover curtains etc Towels are all old and worn out
Positive_Review: We really liked the location it s near shopping area not far from the center and still it s so quiet Breakfast was good nothing really special but good quality and variety Staff at reception and breakfast area was friendly and helpful

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: This hotel was a great place to stay in Vienna We were happy to understand how cute are the rooms same with photos how great is the location near the Oceanarium most popular shopping street walking distance to old city centre and railway station The staff was very helpful also assisted with the forgotten personal pieces in our room Thanks a lot

Negative_Review: With a bit more attention this hotel has a huge potential A bit more smile and kindness bit more and bigger towels and better quality toiletteries the one the hotel provided smelled like some cheap men s parfume in the bathroom a bit more attention to details and perhaps some small refurbishment would make it so much better I opted for an upgrade to a superior room don t do that unless you smoke the balcony offered for this upgrade is ridiculous I would not even call it a balcony Generally I missed those things that makes me feel it was worthwhile to pay extra for going to a hotel compared to renting an apartment
Positive_Review: The location is perfect close to Westbahnhof and Mariahilfe str yet in a very silent street The breakfast was also perfect wide variety of foods and drinks The room was ok but nothing extra

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Good value for money Very friendly and helpful staff 5 minutes to the underground on Mariahilfer Street Close to the English Haydn Cinema shows English Original Version Films without subtitles

Negative_Review: The room facing the street had constant noise from the street even people talking
Positive_Review: The staff was helpful Place was near the train station and close to the shopping street The place was clean

Negative_Review: We slept in a room that had holes in the bed sheets a mark on the sheets and dust everywhere I am sensitive to dust and at night I had trouble breathing The welcome was by a security guard whose first words to us were How would you like to pay at 12am on a Sumday evening The towels were frayed and hard We eventually moved to another room Staff were very stern and not at all welcoming Overall you feel as if you are intruding instead of being welcomed No late check out available for genius guests
Positive_Review: Breakfast was consistent

Negative_Review: Not the friendliest of hotels Would like to know who stepped out the 5 minute walk to the Vienna Airport Lines At a reasonable pace it took us 15minutes
Positive_Review: Was a short distance to the shopping street and great cafe s

Negative_Review: The carpet in the room is dirt The bed is small and uncomfortable In the room is cold the heating was at maximum but the heating device was almost cold
Positive_Review: The location is perfect and the price for the parking place was ok

Negative_Review: Shower screen in bathroom very small so water soaked the entire bathroom near slipped when I needed to go to toilet Bathroom smelt like Mould Everytime someone walked around their room it sounded like an elephant
Positive_Review: Room upgrade meant we had a better sized room

Negative_Review: The staff could be a bit more helpful They were not rude also but they could try to appear more friendly when serving customers
Positive_Review: Nice room very good location near Naschmarkt Westbahnhof and Mariahilfstrasse with nice restaurants around

Negative_Review: Staff wasn t helpful at all I was travelling with 4 pieces of luggage and nobody proposed to help me carry them to the room Totally unacceptable
